Text: **The Monster Hunter's Survival Guide - Case Files - Chupacabra [Graphic Novel]**
This and the Sasquatch GN look to be good!  Thanks I always love anything on Cryptos!

@Mothra67

Glad to hear it! I didnt think anyone would be interested in anything other then zombies. I WILL be uploading the original The Monster Hunter's Survival Guide graphic novel very soon also!
I can't wait!  looking forward to it!

@Mothra67

I have to warn you, it's not like a traditional graphic novel, its more like a novel, with one or two pictures per page. It's really good if you're into monster lore, but it's nothing like the Case Files though!
Cool, I love Monster Lore!  I am ready for it!
